articles.title: Jays' booming bats blast Orioles early in easy win - Reuters
articles.description: Lourdes Gurriel Jr. hit a grand slam to cap a six-run first inning and the Toronto Blue Jays defeated the visiting Baltimore Orioles 9-0 Thursday night at Buffalo.
articles.content:
By Field Level Media

articles.title: Dallas Keuchel pitches White Sox past Blue Jays - Reuters
articles.description: Yasmani Grandal and Adam Engel each homered, Dallas Keuchel struck out a season-high eight batters and the Chicago White Sox pulled away for a 5-2 win over the visiting Toronto Blue Jays on Thursday night.
articles.content:
By Field Level Media

articles.title: FaZe, Ultra close in on CDL's Stage 4 Major final - Reuters
articles.description: The Atlanta FaZe and Toronto Ultra, group winners in the round-robin phase of the Call of Duty League's Stage 4, advanced to the upper-bracket final of the Stage 4 Major on Friday.

articles.title: Martin Maldonado (5 RBIs) leads Astros’ onslaught over Jays - Reuters
articles.description: Martin Maldonado hit a grand slam and had a career-best five RBIs, Carlos Correa added four RBIs with two home runs and the visiting Houston Astros defeated the Toronto Blue Jays 13-1 Friday night at Buffalo.
articles.content:

articles.author: Steve Scherer
articles.title: Canada's top court allows access to murdered billionaires' estate files - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's Supreme Court on Friday ordered the estate files of a slain Canadian pharmaceutical billionaire couple to be unsealed, reasserting the principle that court proceedings should be public in a case led by the Toronto Star newspaper.
articles.content: Mourners arrive for a memorial service for pharmaceutical billionaire Barry Sherman and his wife Honey, days after their mysterious deaths in Toronto, Ontario, Canada, December 21, 2017. REUTERS/ Mar… [+1597 chars]
